001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003// import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
004import java.awt.event.*;
005import java.net.URL;
006import java.awt.image.*;
007import javax.swing.JButton;
008
009/**
010 * Moteur du jeu qui implémente une interface graphique
011 * 
012 * @author Michael Kolling
013 * @version 2.0, 02/08/2024
014 */
015public class UserInterface implements ActionListener {
016    /**
017     * Référence à GameEngine
018     */
019    private GameEngine aEngine;
020    /**
021     * Fenêtre
022     */
023    private JFrame aMyFrame;
024    /**
025     * Zone de texte
026     */
027    private JTextField aEntryField;
028    /**
029     * Console
030     */
031    private JTextArea aLog;
032    /**
033     * Image
034     */
035    private JLabel aImage;
036
037    /**
038     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
039     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
040     * needed.
041     * 
042     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
043     */
044    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
045    {
046        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
047        this.createGUI();
048    } // UserInterface(.)
049
050    /**
051     * Print out some text into the text area.
052     * @param pText Un texte
053     */
054    public void print( final String pText )
055    {
056        this.aLog.append( pText );
057        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
058    } // print(.)
059
060    /**
061     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
062     * @param pText Un texte
063     */
064    public void println( final String pText )
065    {
066        this.print(pText + "\n");
067    } // println(.)
068
069    /**
070     * Show an image file in the interface.
071     * @param pImageName Le nom de l'image
072     */
073    public void showImage(final String pImageName)
074    {
075        String vImagePath = "./assets/images/" + pImageName; // to change the directory
076        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(vImagePath);
077        if ( vImageURL == null )
078            System.out.println("Image not found : " + vImagePath);
079        else {
080            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
081            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
082            this.aMyFrame.pack();
083        }
084    } // showImage(.)
085
086    /**
087     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
088     * @param pOnOff Un booleen
089     */
090    public void enable(final boolean pOnOff) {
091        this.aEntryField.setEditable(pOnOff); // enable/disable
092        if (pOnOff) { // enable
093            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
094            this.aEntryField.addActionListener(this); // reacts to entry
095        }
096        else { // disable
097            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate(0); // cursor won't blink
098            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener(this); // won't react to entry
099        }
100    } // enable(.)
101
102    /**
103     * Interface utilisateur
104     */
105    private void createGUI() {
106        UserInterface t = this;
107        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame("Violet Evergarden");
108        this.aEntryField = new JTextField(34);
109        //Creation d'un bouton
110        JButton vBouton1 = new JButton("Un bouton");
111        vBouton1.setBackground(new Color(235, 250, 255));
112        
113        
114        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
115        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
116        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
117        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
118        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
119
120        this.aImage = new JLabel();
121
122        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
123        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
124        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
125        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
126        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
127        // Pacement du bouton
128        vPanel.add(vBouton1, BorderLayout.EAST);
129
130        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add(vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
131
132        // add some event listeners to some components
133        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
134        
135        vBouton1.addMouseListener(new MouseListener() {
136            public void mousePressed(final MouseEvent pE) {
137                // t.println("Appuyé");
138            }
139
140            public void mouseReleased(final MouseEvent pE) {
141                // t.println("Relaché");
142            }
143
144            public void mouseEntered(final MouseEvent pE) {
145                // vBouton1.setBackground(new Color(230, 230, 255));
146                // t.println("Dans le bouton");
147                
148            }
149
150            public void mouseExited(final MouseEvent pE) {
151                // vBouton1.setBackground(new Color(235, 250, 255));
152                // t.println("Hors le bouton");
153            }
154
155            public void mouseClicked(final MouseEvent pE) {
156                // if(pE.getButton() == 1) {
157                    // t.println("Bouton click gauche");
158                // } else if(pE.getButton() == 3) {
159                    // t.println("Boutton click droit");
160                // }
161            }
162        });
163
164        // to end program when window is closed
165        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
166            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
167                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
168                {
169                    System.exit(0);
170                }
171        } );
172
173        this.aMyFrame.pack();
174        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
175        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
176    } // createGUI()
177
178    /**
179     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
180     * @param pE Un evenement
181     */
182    @Override 
183    public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) {
184        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
185        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
186        this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
187    } // actionPerformed(.)
188    
189
190    
191    /**
192     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
193     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
194     */
195    private void processCommand()
196    {
197        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
198        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
199
200        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
201    } // processCommand()
202} // UserInterface
